user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfort and support in my everyday bras, ensuring they fit well and provided a smooth look under clothing.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a bra that provided a perfect fit and extra coverage, especially for sleeveless outfits. The features of elastic-free sides and back appealed to me as they promised comfort and a smooth silhouette. The positive review about the fit reinforced my decision.

Comfort was my main priority, and this wireless bra's description highlighted its cool, comfortable support without wires. The emphasis on moisture-wicking and cushioned straps made it an attractive option for all-day wear. The positive feedback about the fit further validated my choice.

I wanted a bra that was versatile for both workouts and casual wear. The seamless design and moisture-wicking fabric were key features that caught my attention. Although I appreciated the comfort, I was slightly disappointed with the non-adjustable straps, which affected my overall satisfaction.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, good fit, and quality materials. I value items that are soft against the skin, have a flattering silhouette, and are versatile enough for various occasions. I appreciate when clothing maintains its shape and color after washing, and I tend to favor tagless designs for added comfort. Additionally, I enjoy products that provide good value for money, even if they are slightly higher in price. On the other hand, I dislike items that are poorly sized, have thin or low-quality fabric, or lack adjustability in features like straps. I also find it unappealing when products do not fit comfortably or do not wash well, leading to a loss of shape or size.

conversation.content: I want to find everyday bras that offer comfort, support, and a smooth look under clothing. within my expected price range: [14.99, 28.14]
What specific sizes are you looking for in everyday bras to ensure the best fit and comfort?
I typically look for bras in sizes 36C or 38B to ensure the best fit and comfort. Can you recommend any everyday bras that meet my criteria within the price range of $14.99 to $28.14?

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Bali Lace Desire Underwire Bra, Full-Coverage Lace Bra with Underwire Cups, Plunging Underwire Bra for Everyday Comfort> / Item ID: B09LRG65LD / Price: $21.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Bali®'s Lace Desire® full-coverage underwire bra has everything you want in an underwire style. Comfort and support combine in softly-lined, non-foam underwire cups. Luxurious lace is everywhere, providing the pretty look you want along with an alluring plunging neckline with unlined lace trim that shows a little skin. Stretch satin twill accents and underband further enhance comfort and support. You'll love this allover lace underwire bra's adjustable straps designed to stay in place. Its contours and deep V neckline make it easy to wear under low necklines. When you want lots of lovely lace without sacrificing comfort or support, Bali's full-coverage, underwire lace bra is an ideal choice. Its available in a range of neutral colors, including black lace, and sizes for every figure."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Bali Passion For Comfort Underwire Bra with Full-Coverage, Light Lift Back Smoothing Shapewear Bra for Everyday Wear> / Item ID: B07DGVCWGR / Price: $21.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Bali's Passion for Comfort® full-coverage underwire bra has you covered, front and back. Its full-coverage underwire cups are lined in foam for comfortably light lift. You can choose a T-shirt-smooth style that disappears under clingy clothes or smooth cups accented with pretty chevron-patterned scalloped lace at the top edge. The back and sides are super smooth, crafted of soft touch fabric that feels wonderful against your skin. And you'll love how the back has built-up contours for even more smoothing. Another bonus: the no-slip, adjustable straps convert from traditional straight wear to a crisscross back for fashion flexibility. Available in so many size options, so you're sure to find your perfect fit."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Bali Lace Desire Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Wirefree Bra, ComfortFlex Fit Convertible Bra for Everyday Wear> / Item ID: B071KQC71Y / Price: $18.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you're looking for a lacy, wireless, full-coverage bra that offers sublimely comfortable support, look no further. The Lace Desire® bra is designed with Bali's ComfortFlex® Fit system for a perfect fit from sizes S-2XL. Wirefree cups provide full coverage and are lightly lined to shape and support. Gorgeous open lace covers the entire style and even extends above and below the cups. The no-slip straps are easily adjustable and also designed to convert to a crisscross back with the simple J-hook that's included for wearing flexibility. This bra really does offer the best of everything."]

Based on your preference for everyday bras that offer comfort, support, and a smooth look under clothing, the Bali Wireless Bra (B09WMP5XDL) is a perfect choice.
